```{r}
library(ggplot2)

```
```{r}
table(reddit$age.range)
str(reddit)
reddit$age.range <- factor(reddit$age.range,levels = c("Under 18", "18-24", "25-34", "35-44", "45-54", "55-64", "65 or Above"),ordered = TRUE)
```

```{r}
qplot(data = reddit,x = age.range)
```
